title: FIFA boss sparks fury after he tells women players 'convince us men' in equal pay fight
description: FIFA President Gianni Infantino has been widely criticised for saying women footballers must "pick the right battles" in the fight for equal pay in the World Cup.

title: New Zealand delays contentious plan to tax cow and sheep burps
description: New Zealand farmers have been given more time before they must pay a levy on the methane excreted by their livestock, as a general election looms.

title: Transgender women banned from competing in female chess events by world federation
description: The World Chess Federation has banned transgender women from playing in official female competitions until further notice.

title: Drone hits Moscow building causing 'powerful explosion' three miles from Kremlin
description: Russia has accused Ukraine of targeting Moscow in a drone attack after one smashed into a building causing a "powerful explosion".

title: Police investigate Trump supporters who posted details of Georgia grand jurors online
description: Police in Georgia are investigating threats to members of the grand jury which voted to charge Donald Trump over alleged election interference.

title: Maui's emergency services chief quits after criticism for not sounding sirens as wildfires spread
description: The head of the Maui Emergency Management Agency has abruptly resigned - a day after saying he had no regrets about not using sirens to warn residents of wildfires that killed at least 111 people.
